trans-unit.source: Converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> object to and from other types.
trans-unit.target: Converte um objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> de e em outros tipos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> class only converts an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> to and from a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> classe converte apenas uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> para e de um <xref:System.String>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" character as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converte para e de um <xref:System.String> usando o caractere "+" como o delimitador entre as teclas modificadoras e a ação do mouse.

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys.Control> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.RightClick>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a cadeia de caracteres `Control+RightClick` será convertida em uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> propriedade igual a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys.Control> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> igual da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.RightClick>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Um contexto de formato que fornece informações sobre o ambiente do qual este conversor está sendo invocado.

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: O tipo que está sendo avaliado para conversão.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an object of the specified type can be converted to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto do tipo especificado pode ser convertido em uma instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" />, usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="sourceType" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.String" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="sourceType" /> for do tipo <see cref="T:System.String" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Um contexto de formato que fornece informações sobre o ambiente do qual este conversor está sendo invocado.

trans-unit.source: The type being evaluated for conversion.
trans-unit.target: O tipo que está sendo avaliado para conversão.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> can be converted to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma instância do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> pode ser convertida no tipo especificado, usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="destinationType" /> is of type <see cref="T:System.String" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="destinationType" /> for do tipo <see cref="T:System.String" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Um contexto de formato que fornece informações sobre o ambiente do qual este conversor está sendo invocado.

trans-unit.source: Culture specific information.
trans-unit.target: Informações específicas à cultura.

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert the specified object to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Tenta converter o objeto especificado em um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" />, usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto convertido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converte para e de um <xref:System.String> usando a chave "+" como o delimitador entre as teclas modificadoras e a ação do mouse.

trans-unit.source: For example, the string `Control+RightClick` would be converted into a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys.Control> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.RightClick>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, a cadeia de caracteres `Control+RightClick` será convertida em uma <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> propriedade igual a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys.Control> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> igual da propriedade <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.RightClick>.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> cannot be converter.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> não pode ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: A format context that provides information about the environment from which this converter is being invoked.
trans-unit.target: Um contexto de formato que fornece informações sobre o ambiente do qual este conversor está sendo invocado.

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: O objeto a ser convertido.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert the object to.
trans-unit.target: O tipo no qual converter o objeto.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to convert a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> to the specified type, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Tenta converter um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture" /> no tipo especificado, usando o contexto especificado.

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: O objeto convertido.

trans-unit.source: `destinationType` must be <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: `destinationType` deve ser <xref:System.String>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converts to and from a <xref:System.String> using the "+" key as the delimiter between the modifier keys and the mouse action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGestureConverter> converte para e de um <xref:System.String> usando a chave "+" como o delimitador entre as teclas modificadoras e a ação do mouse.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> with a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys.Control> and <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> property equal to <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.RightClick> converts to the string `Control+RightClick`.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture> com um <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.Modifiers%2A> propriedade igual a <xref:System.Windows.Input.ModifierKeys.Control> e <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseGesture.MouseAction%2A> propriedade igual a <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseAction.RightClick> converte a cadeia de caracteres `Control+RightClick`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> é <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> cannot be converted.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> não pode ser convertido.
